text: Hello everyone. I’m Eduardo Souza, a postdoc from the Australian National University. I’m more on the PL developer side rather than the user side, to be honest. I will be looking into Julia’s GC, trying to understand how it works wrt LLVM, and my long-term goal is to see if I can plug in the MMTk memory toolkit (<https://www.mmtk.io>), exploring Julia as a case study for using LLVM and MMTk together to implement managed languages. I’d appreciate any pointers from the devs, or just people I could get in touch if I end up getting stuck. Thanks in advance!

text: Good luck! Julia's GC is pretty naive compared to more established languages, so this could be a really interesting project! Welcome to the community!
